New Records: Florian Wirtz scored Germany's fastest-ever goal after just seven seconds.
This marked Germany's second consecutive victory over France.
Key Match Events: Florian Wirtz scored Germany's fastest-ever goal seven seconds into the game.
Kai Havertz scored the second goal for Germany in the 49th minute.
Pre-Game Insights: Toni Kroos returned from international retirement for the Euro 2024 preparations.
The match was highlighted by the quick start from Germany.
Post-Match Reflections: The German national team showed resilience and commitment in the match.
Germany's victory boosted coach Julian Nagelsmann's confidence ahead of Euro 2024.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was Germany's third win in 11 games against France.
